sourcesContent:
Start a NEW game:

Number of bots (1-3)

Start an existing game:

Game ID (ask a fried)
import { Component, Input, OnChanges, SimpleChanges } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-game', templateUrl: './game.component.html', styleUrls: ['./game.component.css'] }) export class GameComponent { @Input() username: string = ''; componentShown: string = "meni"; botNo: number | undefined; gameId: number | undefined; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnChanges(changes: SimpleChanges) { if (changes.username) { console.log('Username changed:', this.username); } } startGame() { this.componentShown = "start"; } joinGame() { this.componentShown = "join"; } meni() { this.componentShown = "meni"; } continueGame() { this.http.post('YOUR_API_ENDPOINT/continue-game', { username: this.username }) .subscribe(response => { console.log('Continue game response:', response); }); } startGameRequest() { const body = { username: this.username, action: 'start' }; this.http.post('YOUR_API_ENDPOINT/start-game', body) .subscribe(response => { console.log('Start game response:', response); }); } joinGameRequest() { const body = { username: this.username, action: 'join' }; this.http.post('YOUR_API_ENDPOINT/join-game', body) .subscribe(response => { console.log('Join game response:', response); }); } }
